main event: A round object, the size of a grapefruit, was observed falling to earth and appeared to have exploded before disappearing.
interesting points: The object changed color from white to light green., The sighting lasted only 2-3 seconds., No vapor trail or explosion was observed., Witnesses included a patrolman from the Springfield Police Department., Weather conditions were clear at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: a ball or round object, size of a grapefruit, white turning to light green
